meanings.definition: The process of removing ions from a solution.
meanings.sent1: Deionization is important in water treatment plants.
meanings.sent2: I use deionization to clean the water in my fish tank.
meanings.sent3: The deionization of the water made it taste like nothing!
meanings.sent4: After deionization, the water sparkled like diamonds.
meanings.sent5: The deionization process turned the solution crystal clear.

meanings.definition: The act of purifying water by removing ions.
meanings.sent1: We rely on deionization to make our drinking water safe.
meanings.sent2: The deionization of the water improved its quality.
meanings.sent3: During the deionization process, the ions waved goodbye as they left.
meanings.sent4: The deionization of the water was like a magic spell cleansing it.
meanings.sent5: The deionization treatment made the water taste fresh and pure.
